Item.method_code:
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() ' called onBeforeAdd of "Program" If Me.getProperty("name","") = "" Then Return Me.getInnovator().newError("Program name is missing") End If
Dim newFolder As Item = Me.newItem("Item Folder","add") newFolder.setProperty("name",Me.getProperty("name","")) newFolder = newFolder.apply()
If newFolder.isError() Then Return newFolder
Me.setProperty("top_item_folder_id",newFolder.GetID())
Return Me
Item.name: Create TopFolder And Link 2 Prog
